summary: This document is a response from the New York Department of State to a July 2019 grand jury subpoena from the Southern District of New York, providing certified corporate records for 'Nine East 71st Street Corporation' and 'Maple, Inc.'. The records trace the corporation's history from its 1989 incorporation, listing Jeffrey Epstein as President and Darren K. Indyke as Secretary/Director, and show its dissolution in 2015.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena dated July 10, 2019, demanding corporate records for Nine East 71st Street Corporation and Maple, Inc.

persons.name: Ted B. Hipsher
persons.context: Signed the Certificate of Incorporation for Nine East 71st Street Corporation on August 23, 1989, with an address at Schwartz, Kelm, Warren & Rubenstein in Columbus, Ohio.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the President and Chief Executive Officer of Nine East 71st Street Corporation in multiple corporate filings (1993, 1997, 2003, 2007, 2009, 2011, 2013) and in the 2012 Certificate of Dissolution. Addresses include 41 South High Street, Columbus, OH; 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, USVI; and c/o Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Listed as Secretary and Sole Director of Nine East 71st Street Corporation in the 2012 dissolution filing. Served as the corporation's registered agent for service of process and is the attorney/filer for multiple corporate documents. Addresses include 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY and 575 Lexington Ave, New York, NY.

persons.name: Brendan C. Hughes
persons.context: Certified the annexed copies of corporate documents as true copies for the New York Department of State on July 15, 2019.

persons.name: Rossana Rosado
persons.context: Listed as the Secretary of State of New York on the Department of State's July 16, 2019, cover letter responding to the FBI subpoena.

persons.name: Andrew M. Cuomo
persons.context: Listed as the Governor of New York on the Department of State's July 16, 2019, cover letter responding to the FBI subpoena.

persons.name: Kim Teta
persons.context: Signed the New York Department of State's July 16, 2019, cover letter responding to the FBI subpoena for corporate records.

connections.description: Indyke served as the attorney and corporate secretary/director for Epstein's corporation, Nine East 71st Street Corporation, handling its filings and dissolution.
Hipsher was the incorporator who filed the original Certificate of Incorporation for Epstein's corporation in 1989.

events.title: Incorporation of Nine East 71st Street Corporation
events.description: Certificate of Incorporation filed for Nine East 71st Street Corporation, with Ted B. Hipsher as incorporator.

events.title: Authorization of Corporate Dissolution
events.description: Unanimous written consent obtained to dissolve Nine East 71st Street Corporation, signed by Darren K. Indyke as Secretary.

events.title: Tax Consent for Dissolution
events.description: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance consents to the dissolution of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, effective until July 20, 2015.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: Grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (Geoffrey S. Berman) to the NY Department of State for records on Nine East 71st Street Corporation and Maple, Inc., related to alleged violations including sex trafficking.

events.title: Certification of Corporate Records
events.description: Brendan C. Hughes certifies copies of corporate records for Nine East 71st Street Corporation in response to the grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Subpoena Response Mailed
events.description: New York Department of State mails certified corporate records to the FBI in response to the grand jury subpoena.

locations: Nine East 71st Street Corporation, 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
Maple, Inc., 9100 Havensight, Port of Sales, Suite 15/16, St. Thomas 00802, Virgin Islands, U.S.
6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
457 Madison Ave, 4th FL, New York, NY 10022
26 Federal Plaza, Squad C-40, New York, NY 10278 (FBI)
One Commerce Plaza, 99 Washington Avenue, Albany, NY 12231-0001 (NY Dept of State)
keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued in July 2019 for records related to 'Nine East 71st Street Corporation' and 'Maple, Inc.', indicating these entities were of interest in an investigation into alleged violations of sex trafficking statutes (18 U.S.C. §§ 1591, 1594(c), 2422(b)).
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the President and Chief Executive Officer of Nine East 71st Street Corporation from at least 1993 until its dissolution in 2015.
Darren K. Indyke, an attorney, served as the Secretary, Director, and registered agent for Nine East 71st Street Corporation, handling its biennial filings and dissolution.
The corporation was incorporated in August 1989 and was dissolved in 2015 after obtaining tax consent.

The corporate address changed over time from Columbus, Ohio, to various New York City addresses (575 Lexington Ave, 457 Madison Ave, 301 E 66th St) and a St. Thomas, USVI address (6100 Red Hook Quarter).
